subject: Order #SSN5140
description_text:
Hello,

Can you please advise shipping date for order #SSN5140

Kind Regards
Jason Hore

conversations.body_text: Hi Jason Hore,  Latest production update: The HS Pro shifter will be shipped on December 29. The schedule was slightly delayed due to issues with components before shipment.

Good afternoon,

Can you please provide an update on this order and if it has been shipped?

Kind Regards
Jason Hore

On Sun, Dec 28, 2025 at 1:56 PM service@simsonn.com

Good morning,

Can you please provide an update on this order and if it has been shipped?

Kind Regards
Jason Hore

Hi Jason Hore,  I apologize for the delayed response.  Your package was shipped on the 7th and is currently in transit. It will arrive shortly.You can track your shipping information via the following link:  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047224438351
